Question: The April 1999 cover of Rolling Stone featured this person lying on her bed, clad with a bra, shorts and an open top.
Hints: In May 2012, this person was hired as a judge for the second season of the American version of The X Factor.
She also stated that this person inspired her deep love for choreography.
At age eight, this person and her mother Lynne traveled to Atlanta for an audition in the 1990s revival of The Mickey Mouse Club.
